definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

pinyin: Di2 ka3 er2 zuo4 biao1 zhi4

sentences.english: And if I go look at the polar form of this, OK, good, looks right, right?
sentences.chinese: 现在它有一个不同的坐标，以及跟原来相同的角度？

sentences.english: This is due to the fact that Euler angles are always expressed relative to the global coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 这归咎于欧拉角总是以球坐标系表示。

sentences.english: Data recorded along two geophone axes are displayed as a function of time.
sentences.chinese: 沿两个检波器坐标轴记录的数据显示为一个时间函数。

sentences.english: The corresponding equations in general coordinates are also presented though without derivation.
sentences.chinese: 还给出了这些关系式的一般坐标形式，虽然没加引求。

sentences.english: Provide 60 sets of files for storages, three axises can change dimension between meter and Inch.
sentences.chinese: 提供60组档案储存，三轴坐标可公英制切换。

sentences.english: Well, let's plug its coordinates into the plane equation.
sentences.chinese: 让我们把它的坐标代入平面方程。

sentences.english: We have written the compatibility equation in a form that corresponds with the polar geometry.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经把协调方程写成了极坐标的形式。

sentences.english: The unified symmetry and conserved quantity of the holonomic mechanical systems with remainder coordinates are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究有多余坐标完整系统的对称性与守恒量。

sentences.english: Each Faculty is run by a Dean who coordinates the work of Departments.
sentences.chinese: 每个学院由一个坐标系系主任谁的工作部门。

sentences.english: The ordinate scale is linear in decibels.
sentences.chinese: 纵坐标比例尺以分贝为单位是线性的。

sentences.english: Stability of an Iterative Dual-Doppler Wind Synthesis in Cartesian Coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 笛卡尔坐标系中迭代双多普勒风合成的稳定性。

sentences.english: The objects are repositioned to fit into the new coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 对象会被重新放置，以适合这个新的坐标系统。

sentences.english: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 返回指定坐标处的项的从零开始的索引。

sentences.english: The starting speed of particles in world space, along X, Y, and Z.
sentences.chinese: 粒子在世界坐标系内的开始速度，沿着X，Y和Z轴。

sentences.english: Chinese clothing, coordinates cannot be found.
sentences.chinese: 而汉派服装，找不到坐标。

sentences.english: Select csys, datum point or location as the reference for entering offsets.
sentences.chinese: 选取坐标系，基准点或位置作为偏移的参考。

definition: time and place/world of a particular locale and era/(physics) space-time
